A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They managed to ruin the possible plot twist for the important characters. Instead they made them insignificant and weak. Kylo Ren is not worthy of being a main villain\, Luke's character is ruined beyond repair\, Rey is a nobody with the ability of a Jedi master\, Poe and Finn are useless and Leia is a flying princess..I mean c'mon they managed to ruin the star wars mythology and our beloved characters with a single movie. To quote Han Solo \"That is not how the force works\". Also the main plot of the movie was meh and full of plot holes. As a huge starwars fan who watched all of the movies multiple times and played every starwars game I find this movie to be a complete rape to the starwars saga.
